text: Tyla Laura Seethal (born January 30, 2002), known by her pseudonym Tyla, is an indigenous South African singer and songwriter. She was born and raised in Johannesburg and signed to Epic Records in 2021 following the domestic success of her debut single "Getting Late" featuring Kooldrink. She gained recognition with her 2023 single, Water from her debut single" Tyla". == Discography == == Family Relations == == References == Category:Living people Category:2002 births Category:South African singers Category:People from Johannesburg Category:Pop singers Category:R&B; singers Category:Dancers Category:Singer- songwriters
title: Tyla
